name: MUSH - Dope World
description: Opioids remain the most harmful drug, as over the past decade, the total number of deaths due to opioid use disorders went up 71 per cent. A motion piece from my shortfilm.  Minted as an experimental NFT for my graduation Thesis from Lahtis Instute of Design, Finland. Bachelor of Culture and Arts Spring 2021 - Niklas Rekola aka. Mushcube
